title: Dont patches normally happen on Tuesdays?
body: my client didnt patch and i dont see any new content. getting in game now to check ap items? Did it go out last night

replies.body: Patch 5.13 was delayed by a bit, and instead, the patch will begin on July 9th. The [LoL Server Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) can keep you in the loop for these kinds of things. :]
You might want to have that on the front page today as this will not be the last time someone will ask this.
It's usually early on Wednesday mornings, occasionally on Thursday mornings when it has been delayed, and this patch was delayed, expect it early in Tomorrow morning.
